description: Madoka and her friends hop aboard Dizelmine’s ship hoping to see Yurikano. To their surprise, the girls are given a warm welcome by Dizelmine, who expresses his gratitude for their being good friends with his sister.

titles.title: In Orbit Above the Summer Skies of Kamogawa
Kamogawa Joukuu Eisei Kidou nite, Natsu
鴨川上空衛星軌道にて・夏
